picket_fence_narrow_recipe.flavor: If it's not white, is our life unfulfilled?

wooden_arch_window_recipe.flavor: It took me a while to spot the arches.

wooden_arch_window_tall_recipe.description: Hard to decide whether pretty or spooky.
wooden_arch_window_tall_recipe.flavor: At least it doesn't make strange noises, does it?

wooden_double_door_2_recipe.description: Compared to usual door, this is much safer and slightly heavier.

wooden_tunnel_door_2_recipe.description: Sturdy enough for blocking off tunnels.
wooden_tunnel_door_2_recipe.flavor: But not to block bipedal creatures.

stone_wooden_door_2_recipe.flavor: At least from a rabbit's perspective.

stone_wooden_double_door_recipe.flavor: When you think of it, it looks more like an exit.

stone_wooden_double_door_2_recipe.description: Sturdy and durable. For a door.
stone_wooden_double_door_2_recipe.flavor: Place a few and you have a small castle!

stone_wooden_tunnel_door_2_recipe.description: Wooden door cannot be any stronger than this.

clothed_dining_table_recipe.description: Adds a pinch of civilised elegance.
clothed_dining_table_recipe.flavor: Still eating on bare tables? How middle class.

comfy_arch_backed_chair_recipe.description: Just in case kneeling exhausted you.

wooden_window_frame_shutter_recipe.flavor: It says 'Designed in Italy'. What is Italy?

wooden_window_frame_shutter_blue_recipe.flavor: It says 'Designed in Italy'. What is Italy?

comfy_stool_recipe.description: Leaning too much may cause gravitation problems.
comfy_stool_recipe.flavor: Life is way easier with pillows.

dresser_narrow_recipe.description: One tile narrower than regular dresser.
dresser_narrow_recipe.flavor: Fills even-tiles spaces like never before!

shelf_recipe.description: Empty, but makes the room more cosy.
shelf_recipe.flavor: Especially if you like looking at boards.

simple_wooden_stool_recipe.description: While sitting food is 20% more effective.
simple_wooden_stool_recipe.flavor: Good if you prefer a rustical touch.

wardrobe_recipe.description: Hides your stuff and cracks in the wall.

wooden_latticed_window_tall_recipe.description: Extra height adds an air of elegance.

cobblestone_fence_narrow_recipe.flavor: Use the earth itself to form the walls of the pasture? Genius!

stone_window_frame_tall_recipe.description: Extra height adds an air of elegance.

stone_arch_window_recipe.flavor: It took me a while to spot the arches.

stone_arch_window_tall_recipe.description: Hard to decide whether pretty or spooky.
stone_arch_window_tall_recipe.flavor: At least it doesn't make strange noises, does it?

stone_doorway_recipe.flavor: The Carpenter can mount door in doorways for more privacy.

stone_double_doorway_recipe.description: A larger frame. It makes quite an impression.
stone_double_doorway_recipe.flavor: Tiny creatures may be impressed, indeed.

clothed_stone_table_recipe.description: Let's hope the cloth isn't as heavy as the table.
clothed_stone_table_recipe.flavor: At least it hides all the imperfections.

comfy_stone_chair_recipe.flavor: "Heavens! What am I sitting on?" --Dowager Countess of Grantham

hardly_a_bed_recipe.description: Soft for a piece of stone.
hardly_a_bed_recipe.flavor: At least allows to dream of comfort.

comfy_stone_bed_recipe.description: Sleeping in a comfy bed makes Hearthlings happier.
comfy_stone_bed_recipe.flavor: "And I seem to find the happiness I seek!" --Lewis Armstronk

stone_latticed_window_tall_recipe.description: Extra height adds an air of elegance.

pond_recipe.description: Shallow enough to prevent anyone from drowning.
pond_recipe.flavor: "Relax, take it easy now." --Michael Holbrook Penniman

comfy_clay_bed_recipe.description: Sleeping in a comfy bed makes Hearthlings happier.
comfy_clay_bed_recipe.flavor: Sultan Shahryar himself would oversleep in it.

tan_tall_latticed_window_recipe.flavor: Adds a bit of oriental elegance to the mix.
